content.text:
I Need a Dog

Every child should have a dog for a pet. The shelter has lots of dogs that need homes. We should go and get one this {l}Weekend. A dog can sleep with me and keep me warm. A dog can swim in the lake with me. {u}it might even save me if I start to go under{.} A dog will run and play with me on a {-|a} sunny day or listen to me read on a rainy day. I can teach a dog tricks like “shake hands” and “roll over.” I will give my dog food {+|and} water. I will also give it a bath. I will clean up its messes. I really need a dog{.}
